citations.narrative:
Bulk food bins in two buildings have evidence of grain pests in the food. Food contaminated with pests can lead to
degradation of the quality of the food and affect the animal's health. Correct by 30 July 2025 by ensuring all food is
wholesome, palatable, and free from contamination and of sufficient quantity and nutritive value to maintain all animals in
good health.
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the Attending Veterinarian and IACUC Chair.
n

narrative:
3.129(a) 
   
Feeding. 
Bulk food bins in two buildings have evidence of grain pests in the food. Food contaminated with pests can lead to 
degradation of the quality of the food and affect the animal's health. Correct by 30 July 2025 by ensuring all food is 
wholesome, palatable, and free from contamination and of sufficient quantity and nutritive value to maintain all animals in 
good health. 
 
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the Attending Veterinarian and IACUC Chair. 
 
 n

species.common: DOMESTIC PIG / POTBELLY PIG / MICRO PIG
